duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide telehealth therapy sessions to clients, offering counseling and support in a virtual environment.
Maintain a high volume of regular client referrals and ensure a therapy-focused model with minimal administrative work.
Work flexible hours per week, allowing clients to schedule based on their availability and needs.
Deliver therapy sessions from any location with a reliable internet connection, ensuring quality service delivery.
Utilize telehealth technology and platforms to facilitate seamless and secure virtual therapy sessions.

education_certification.credential: Active state license/s, Independent License Required for Licensed Mental Health Counselor – LMHC, LCMHC, Licensed Clinical Social Worker – LCSW, LICSW, Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist - LMFT, Licensed Professional Counselor – LPC, LPCC, LCPC - Licensed Mental Health Professional - LMHP, or Psychologist (PhD/PsyD)
